description: T.1 Holly - Fell (Terminal Decline).T.2 Yew - 20% holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points whilst mainting good shape and form.T.3 Pine - Fell (Terminal Decline).T.4 Hawthorne - Fell (Terminal Decline).T.5 Yew - Light reshape to encourage growth.T.6 Lime - Crown reduction to previous points (approx 20%).T.7 Yew - 50cm-1m holistic crown reshape bringing over extended growth back in line with main crown, removing secondary limb rubbing against Pine back to parent fork on same limb & remove 2 smaller rubbing limbs higher up & deadwood.S.8 Laurel - Prune back from lawn by 1m (exempt).H.9 Privet - Fell (exempt).T.10 Yew - 1m holistic crown reshape staying in the green.T.11 Norway Maple - Fell.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
